resources.string:
This app has been developed by Team Lakshya of NIT Jalandhar. Purpose of this app is to solve the awareness problem among farmers and to reduce the semantic gap between the government and farmers.
Team Lakshya consists of three members:
Shivam Mahajan - 3rd year ECE student in NITJ
Ayush Sen - 3rd year ECE student in NITJ
Lakhveer Singh - 3rd year ECE student in NITJ

Made with love.

Regards,
Team Lakshya
